Date: Thursday, 2/20/1991
Subject: Are you serious
I have to say that I am VERY disappointed!
That's not the way business is done.
How can you offer ME a minor league deal???

Bruce Bochy

Subject: Your offer sounds good

Regards,
Willie Wilson

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Kevin Jordan
Dear Sir,
Kevin Jordan isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Tulsa Drillers!
He has an AVG of .239, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
